title: Aleksandr Razumov
text:
Aleksandr Nikolayevich Razumov (; born 12 November 1980) is a former <a href="Russia">Russia</a>n professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
Club career.
He played in the <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> for <a href="FC%20Ural%20Yekaterinburg">FC Ural Yekaterinburg</a> in 2003.
